hero_description: The ally of your homemade cocktails, to make all your favorite mixology recipes with the perfect natural & gourmet touch!​
product_description: The feeling of purity and freshness is immediately evident from the first sip.​
product_taste: Kaskad Tonic Original has the perfect balance between a sugary, light, very pleasant taste and a bitter, very present taste while still allowing the other aromas to express themselves.
product_page_title: A new 100% natural category. Take life in Serum
product_page_description: Brand committed to its territory. It was created with the aim of reducing the waste of raw materials, since it is made up of 99% whey, collected from the production of ultrafiltered cow's milk.
